name: RainFall (YumpGames)
description:
This is my best friend Jonathan and I's first attempt at making our own game from scratch. Our friend Curtis designed the building that you play on.

The game is the opposite of a race as you are aiming to get the slowest time possible. Eventually if we get enough interest we would like to make a global leaderboard and possibly even make the game multiplayer!

Game Info:

Grey Ball = Speed increase

Red Ball = Boost forward + Speed increase

Green Ball = Speed decrease

Blue Ball = Boost backward + Speed reset to 0

White Ball = Size decrease

Any ball will make your size increase except for the White Ball.
